dt: {bc}any of a breed of large dogs developed in Scotland that occur in rough-coated and smooth-coated varieties and have erect ears and a long muzzle

shortdef: any of a breed of large dogs developed in Scotland that occur in rough-coated and smooth-coated varieties and have erect ears and a long muzzle

dt: {bc}any of a breed of large herding dogs of Scottish origin that have a long rough coat and drooping ears

shortdef: any of a breed of large herding dogs of Scottish origin that have a long rough coat and drooping ears

dt: {bc}any of a breed of medium-sized sheepdogs of British origin noted for their herding abilities

shortdef: any of a breed of medium-sized sheepdogs of British origin noted for their herding abilities
